info.name: Dueling Nexus game field theme
info.description:
Enjoy the best Dueling Nexus theme. Designed with love.

Apart from the instant visual enhancements. The custom vector game field scales to fit any screen size. The layout have been enhanced specially the card description/chat area alongside various other minor changes and game-play animations to enhance your user experience.  

♦ ♦ ♦ Important note: for Firefox users whom experiencing some animation lag, make sure to go to Customize Settings and select Firefox on the Browser option

♦ ♦ ♦ You can select any background you prefer besides the included images  (by clicking on Customize Settings) from this page. You can also change various settings.

♦ ♦ ♦ Make sure you turn on auto-updates for styles on Stylish/Stylus extension settings.

This skin only affects the duelingnexus game/duel & deck editor window so far.

Amazing Yu-Gi-Oh! backgrounds are created by: maxiuchiha22
https://www.deviantart.com/maxiuchiha22
info.additionalInfo:
Made the colors of spell & trap zones uniform.
Made the summon zones indicators more visible.
Made the cards that can be activated more visible.
Minor style enhancements.

Added the ability to choose or set your costume background image.

Added visible disabled field zones.

Redesigned buttons and windows.
Enhanced the layout of the Card description/Chat area.

You will be able to read the card description while the card selector is open on duelingnexus.

Minor enhancements.

Jan 6 2020
Added the deck editor styling.

Jan 7 2020
Added more backgrounds.

Jan 22 2020
Added scroll-ability to deck editor.

Jan 31 2020
Added side-decking styling

Nov 25 2020
Fixing some performance issues by removing unwanted animations
Design and layout refinements
